block.p: Hannah Saville Metcalf, a daughter of Charlotte S. Metcalf of Norwich, Vt., and the late Michael P. Metcalf, was married yesterday to James McMillan Childs, a son of Elsie and Samuel W. Childs of Bloomfield, Conn. The Rev. Daniel Burke, an Episcopal priest, officiated at the bride's home in Exeter, R.I.
Mr. and Mrs. Childs graduated from Hobart and William Smith Colleges, where they met.

Hannah Saville Metcalf, a daughter of Charlotte S. Metcalf of Norwich, Vt., and the late Michael P. Metcalf, was married yesterday to James McMillan Childs, a son of Elsie and Samuel W. Childs of Bloomfield, Conn. The Rev. Daniel Burke, an Episcopal priest, officiated at the bride's home in Exeter, R.I.
Mr. and Mrs. Childs graduated from Hobart and William Smith Colleges, where they met.

The bride, 27, is a preschool teacher at the Spruce Street Nursery School in Boston. Her mother owns a farm in Norwich. Her father was the chairman and publisher of the Providence Journal Company in Providence, R.I.

The bridegroom, 25, is the assistant director of advertising for Tennis Championships Magazine in Lynn, Mass. His father is a senior vice president in the private client group of Fleet BankBoston in Hartford. The bridegroom's mother is a volunteer hospice worker at Hartford Hospital.
